subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: Coughlin met with the Eagles and may soon meet with San Francisco. The Giants interviewed the ex-Falcons coach Mike Smith and were expected to talk to the Bengals’ offensive coordinator, Hue Jackson.
snippet: Coughlin met with the Eagles and may soon meet with San Francisco. The Giants interviewed the ex-Falcons coach Mike Smith and were expected to talk to the Bengals’ offensive coordinator, Hue Jackson.
